sentences.en: An opulent priest is a contradiction.
sentences.cn: 教士养尊处优,就是离经叛道.

sentences.en: An opulent, flamboyant wine with definitive varietal characters.
sentences.cn: 集中体现了阿根廷上等葡萄酒的特点.

sentences.en: David Deans, as we have said , was easy , and even opulent in his circumstances.
sentences.cn: 如我们所知,戴维·迪恩斯家境不差, 甚至相当富裕.

sentences.en: Early white wines are showing a good balance of acidity and more opulent, exotic fruit flavours.
sentences.cn: 早期白葡萄表现出良好的酸度平衡和更为充足更富吸引力的果味.
用华丽织物做成的晚礼服

sentences.en: In orbit over Coruscant, Xizor maintained an opulent skyhook resort called the Falleen's Fist.
sentences.cn: 在环绕科洛桑的轨道上, 西佐保养着自己奢华的疗养太空梭,法林之拳号.

sentences.en: Most of the cash went on supporting his opulent lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 大部分现金都花在了维系他挥金如土的生活方式上。

sentences.en: Opulent tropical and ripe pear flavours, together with mineral notes on the nose.
sentences.cn: 丰富的热带水果和熟梨子的香气混合了矿物质的气息.

sentences.en: Taste notes: Chateau Margaux makes opulent and rich wine.
sentences.cn: 品尝记录: 玛歌庄园酒丰硕浓郁.

sentences.en: The couple live an opulent lifestyle and travel all the time.
sentences.cn: 这对夫妻过着奢华的生活一天到晚都在旅行.

sentences.en: The duke built an opulent palace for himself nearby.
sentences.cn: 公爵还在附近为自己建了一座豪华的宫殿.

sentences.en: The most unique and opulent inhabitant is the star Eta Carinae at far left.
sentences.cn: 最特别、最华丽的居民就是船底座Eta星,靠近左边.

sentences.en: The opulent hotel charges over 600 dollars for its smallest room.
sentences.cn: 这家豪华旅馆最小的房间都要600元.

sentences.en: This was not the easy Hurstwood of Chicago -- not the liberal, opulent Hurstwood she had known.
sentences.cn: 这已不是芝加哥的那个自由自在的赫斯渥, 不是她过去认识的那个豪放 、 阔绰的赫斯渥了.

sentences.en: Velvety Tasting term used to describe a textured, opulent mouth feel in wine.
sentences.cn: 品尝术语,用来描述具有质地的, 丰富口感的葡萄酒.

sentences.en: When released this car was the best driving, most opulent and technology - laden vehicle in its class.
sentences.cn: 这台车上市的时候,它是这个级别中操控性最好, 最豪华,技术最领先的车型.

trans.tran_cn: 富裕的，豪华的，<正>富足的，繁茂的
trans.tran_en: very rich and spending a lot of money
